titleStmt.title: A pleasant new song of the backes complaint, for bellies wrong, or, A farwell to good fellowship to the tune of A,B,C / [Edward Cutler]
titleStmt.author: Cutler, Edward.

notesStmt.note: Date of imprint suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
Imperfect: faded, with loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Pepys Library.
